        public byte[] read(long startByte,
                   long length)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This would read a selection of bytes from the file.
        Parameters:
        startByte - The byte at which one would like to begin reading
        length - The amount of bytes one would like to read
        Returns:
        An array of the bytes read from the file
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - This would arise if one tries to read more bytes than are in the file
